thread.title: BRIEF-Teledyne Technologies Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.84

title: BRIEF-Teledyne Technologies Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.84
text:
February 1, 2018 / 12:33 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Teledyne Technologies Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.84 Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Teledyne Technologies Inc: * TELEDYNE TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.95 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.84 
* Q4 SALES $704.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $669.3 MILLION 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.74 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $7.51 TO $7.61 
* SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.50 TO $1.55 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
